thread.title: I posted this pic of me and my sisters, but the hashtags are getting all the attention
thread.title_full: I posted this pic of me and my sisters, but the hashtags are getting all the attention

author: Bristol Palin
title: I posted this pic of me and my sisters, but the hashtags are getting all the attention
text:
March 20, 2017 by Bristol Palin 
Ha! You guys know I love my family, especially my sisters. 
So when I posted this photo of me, Piper, and Willow, I got a lot of response… and not just because of Willow’s hair! A post shared by Bristol Meyer (@bsmp2) on Mar 19, 2017 at 8:29pm PDT 
What caused the attention were the hashtags: 
best sister friends #usually #sometimes #almostnever #jk 
But any set of sisters know this is just the way it is! I love them SO much… most of the time! 
Click CONTINUE to see photos of Piper’s Sweet 16th!
